column3: Met Office MIDAS Open: UK Land Surface Stations Data
The authority is the latest organisation which owned the station
Closed stations without an authority listed have the authority set to NA
The midas_qc_version_number indicates if the data are original received message (0) or current best version (1)
missing values are identified with the missing data flag
Date and time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS) of the observation
a station may have more than one id assigned to it designated by the id_type
a station may have more than one id assigned to it defined by id_type
The midas_qc_version_number indicates if the data are original received message (0) or current best version (1)
clock time at end of observation as HHMM
unique source identifier or station site number

state indicator for the current stage in the life of the record (see MIDAS documentation)
